name: Fission Friends
description:
Controls: 
  • Move: W/A/S/D 
  • Aim: Mouse  
  • Deactivate Beam: Click
How To Play:

Avoid getting hit while using your fission beam to slow down the unstable particles and accelerate their breakdown process. Step into the energy wells to change your beam color; the beam does more damage to particles of matching color.

Particle Types: 
  • Red: Volatile, fast movement
  • Yellow: Slow breakdown process
  • Green: Creates many smaller particles
